item.title: I Don't Care?
item.description: Photo by Mitch Lensink Let’s start with your imagination: in a team discussion, someone purposes a solution to solve a certain problem. However, another expresses a strong opinion ageist that solution. The discussion is heating up with arguments back and forth. You are sitting there in your zone silently and listening to the whole conversation insouciantly. Suddenly, someone asks you, “What’s your opinion?”. You replied without hesitation, “I don’t care.
